law.text:
As used in KRS 211.1751 to 211.1755:
"Agency" means a local health department established pursuant to the provisions of KRS Chapter 212, excluding a health department in a county containing a city of the first class, a consolidated local government, an urban-county health department, or an independent district health department.
"Classification plan" means the system of classes and job descriptions, and the process for the installation and maintenance of the classification plan.
"Compensation plan" means a series of salary ranges to which classes of positions are assigned so that classifications evaluated as approximately equal may be assigned to the same salary range.
"Council" means the Local Health Department Employment Personnel Council created in KRS 211.1752.
"Department" means the Department for Public Health within the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 343, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 201, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 287, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994.
